Package controllers

Contains controllers responsible for user input.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddStrategyController
    On-click adds event specified in the constructor, applying custom strategy.
    CalendarController
    Responsible for drawing and updating calendar view.
    Controller
    Abstract superclass responsible for communication between user and application.
    CreateUserController
    Handles user creation process.
    DatePickerController
    Handles choosing date by a user from a datepicker.
    DeleteUserController
    Handles user deletion process.
    EventDetailsController
    Handles event management form an event details window.
    EventFilterController
    Filters events in export manager.
    EventManagerController
    EventManagerController controls actions invoked by views.gui.EventManager.
    ExportManagerController
    Handles export process.
    ImportController
    This class is used when User presses the "import" button in main calendar view.
    ImportEditButtonController
    This class hooks pressing the "Edit" button to opening an EventManager window for user interaction.
    ImportManagerController
    Handles import process.
    LoginController
    Handles login process.
    SettingsController
    Saves user settings.
    TaskDetailsController
    TaskDetailsController defines actions for buttons in views.gui.TaskDetails.
    TaskManagerController
    Controller used to create new Task from user specific data.
    WeekPickerBackController
    Sets previous week on the calendar.
    WeekPickerController
    Sets the calendar for the specific date.
    WeekPickerNextController
    Switches calendar to the next week.

Package controllers Description

Contains controllers responsible for user input.
